text: @LindseyGrahamSC So Russia is stealing COVID-19 data and has been putting bounties on US troops. How about releasing the full unredacted Mueller report and all the evidence? How about growing a set of balls and stand up to Putin? https://t.co/2Nb34j5Y5q
